name: classroom-lib-backend
description: Main backend for all components of the classroom-lib ecosystem. Will serve (classroom-lib-dashboard, classroom-lib-kiosk, and classroom-lib). On top of this, providiing an api for needed functionality (Users, UserBooks, ActivityLog, Students and Library) - all collections within MongoDB. In the future will provide this capability to (classroom-lib-dashboard-app and classroom-lib-kiosk-app).
author: Joshua Kemp
